tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ad_conversion_rates (
    ad_id INT,
    campaign_id INT,
    conversion_date DATE,
    conversion_amount DECIMAL,
    conversion_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_campaigns (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ad_clicks (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  campaign_id INT,
  click_time TIMESTAMP,
  user_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE ad_conversions (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  click_id INT,
  conversion_time TIMESTAMP,
  revenue DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE ad_campaigns (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_clicks (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_id INT,
    click_date DATE,
    user_id INT,
    conversion BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (ad_id) REFERENCES ad_campaigns(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ad_impressions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    ad_id INT,
    impression_date DATE,
    user_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (ad_id) REFERENCES ad_campaigns(id)
);

CREATE TABLE campaign_performance (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    campaign_id INT,
    clicks INT,
    impressions INT,
    conversions INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (campaign_id) REFERENCES ad_campaigns(id)
);
